Is it hard to create a scope by transferring it from WTDraw to a standard scope? This application will help you.

Instructions:

1) Choose a name for the file (otherwise it will have the standard name ASightConv)

2) Choose the location where the sight will be saved (it will be permanently saved until you change it).

3) Upload your drawn sight from the WTDraw site b...

Эна в купальник

Ena in a swimsuit
#Ena #sight #alltanks

Clean custom sight for high-tier ground vehicles.
No range scales or unnecessary visual clutter — just what you need to aim fast and stay focused.

Installation:
Download the file and extract it to:
War Thunder/userSights/all tanks

In-game:
Options → Ground Vehicle Battle Settings → Sight Settings → Choose Preset: User Sight → Select the downloaded sight → Save

CONVERTOR BLK TO JSON!

About the Program

This program converts .blk files into a structured .json format.

It extracts drawLines{} and drawQuads{} sections and transforms them into a machine-readable JSON object, useful for creating custom sights, visual elements, or further data processing.

|-----------------> Link to the Github page <-----------------|
https://github.com/REFORDER/BLK-to-JSON
|-----------------> Link to the Github page <-----------------|

How to Use

1) Launch the program
